synopsis.text: Emperor's orders send a renowned archer, Minamoto no Raikou, on a mission to retrieve a mystical gemstone that promises to restore peace and prosperity to the crumbling city of Kyoto in ancient Japan. As the once-glorious capital suffers from famine, disease, and political strife, Raikou falls victim to the very illness he aims to eradicate. Determined to fulfill her brother's mission, his youngest sister, Hikaru, secretly embarks on the perilous journey. As she encounters various people and adventures, Hikaru's quest for the legendary gemstone uncovers a complex web of power struggles and hidden agendas in this thrilling and heartwarming tale set in the Heian period.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
